summary.span: 代表與 相關的參數集合，以及它們對 中資料行的個別對應。

span.span: Represents a collection of parameters relevant to an as well as their respective mappings to columns in a .

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用具名參數時，在集合中的參數數目必須等於命令文字中的具名參數的數目，或.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 會引發錯誤。When using named parameters, the number of parameters in the collection must be equal to the number of named parameters within the command text, or the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle raises an error. 將參數傳遞給 SQL 陳述式所呼叫的.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 不支援問號 （？） 預留位置的`CommandType.Text`。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`. 在此情況下，您必須使用具名的參數。In this case, named parameters must be used. 例如: For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` 當使用具名參數的 SQL 陳述式中呼叫的`CommandType.Text`，您必須在參數名稱，使用冒號 （:）。When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:). 不過，在預存程序中，或參考您的程式碼中的其他位置的具名參數 (例如，在新增時，才物件新增至屬性)，不在之前使用冒號 （:） 的具名的參數。However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding objects to the property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:). 資料提供者會自動提供冒號。The data provider supplies the colon automatically. ## Examples 下列範例會建立多個執行個體經由內。The following example creates multiple instances of through the within the . 這些參數用來選取資料庫中的資料，然後放置在資料。These parameters are used to select data within the database and then place the data in the . 這個範例假設和已經建立具有適當的結構描述、 命令和連線。This example assumes that a and an have already been created with the appropriate schema, commands, and connection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleParameter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleParameter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleParameter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleParameter/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請謹慎使用這個多載方法，以指定整數參數值。Use caution when using this overload of the method to specify integer parameter values. 由於這個多載接受 型別的 `value`，因此您必須在值為零時將整數值轉換成 型別，如下面的 C# 範例所示。Because this overload takes a `value` of type , you must convert the integral value to an type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates. ``` parameters.Add("pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ``` 如果您不會執行這項轉換，編譯器會假設您嘗試呼叫`OracleParameterCollection.Add`(`string`， `OracleType`) 多載。If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler will assume you are attempting to call the `OracleParameterCollection.Add` (`string`, `OracleType`) overload.
